tool_description: Compares multiple versions of alternative text for the same content to identify the most effective option based on accessibility criteria.

alt_text_versions.description: Array of alternative text versions to compare

comparison_criteria.description: Criteria for comparison: brevity, completeness, clarity, wcag_compliance, screen_reader_friendly

content_context.description: Context information about the content being described

weight_preferences.description: Weight preferences for each criterion (must match criteria array length)

error_messages: Invalid alt text versions: Provide 2-10 alternative text versions to compare.
Invalid comparison criteria: Use criteria from [brevity, completeness, clarity, wcag_compliance, screen_reader_friendly].
Weight mismatch: weight_preferences array length must match comparison_criteria array length.
Invalid weight values: All weight preferences must be positive numbers.
Comparison analysis failed: Unable to complete comparison due to insufficient data.
usage: Provide alt_text_versions array with 2-10 versions. Optionally specify comparison_criteria, content_context, and weight_preferences. The tool analyzes each version and recommends the best option.

recommended_version.description: Index of the recommended alt text version (0-based)

strengths_weaknesses.description: Key strengths and weaknesses identified for each version

improvement_suggestions.description: Suggestions for further improving the recommended version
